com.sensoro.beacon.kit

Class Beacon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sensoro.beacon.kit.Beacon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Beacon
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    The class of the beacon.The class can show all informantion of the beacon.

      • getMovingState

        public int getMovingState()
        Get the moving state of the beacon.
        Returns:
        Moving state.
        Integer.MAX_VALUE means that the beacon has no accelerator sensor or the accelerator sensor is disabled.

      • getBatteryLevel

        public int getBatteryLevel()
        Get the rest percent of the battery level.
        Returns:
        The rest battery level.90 means 90%.

      • getHardwareModelName

        public java.lang.String getHardwareModelName()
        Get the hardware model of the beacon
        Returns:
        Hardware mode(only support A0 beacon and B0 beacon in current)

      • getTemperature

        public int getTemperature()
        Get the environment temperature of the beacon.
        Returns:
        The value of temperature(unit:centigrade)
        Integer.MAX_VALUE means the beacon has no temperature sensor or the temperature sensor is disabled.

      • getLight

        public double getLight()
        Get the illumination intensity of the beacon.
        Returns:
        The illumination intensity of the beacon (unit:lux)
        Double.MAX_VALUE means that the beacon has no light sensor or the light sensor is disabled.

      • getAccelerometerCount

        public int getAccelerometerCount()
        Get the trigger count of the acceleration sensor of beacon.
        Returns:
        The trigger count of acceleration sensor
        Integer.MAX_VALUE means the beacon has no accelerator sensor or the accelerator sensor is disabled.
